Package com.atakmap.map

Class AtakMapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.AtakMapController
  • @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="4.2",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="4.5")
public class AtakMapController
extends java.lang.Object
    Deprecated.
    use CameraController
    Control object for moving the ortho-graphic map around the MapView

      • panTo

        public void panTo​(GeoPoint point,
                  boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map to a specific GeoPoint centered in the MapView. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        point - The geographic coordinate to center on
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
        See Also:
        AtakMapView

      • panTo

        public void panTo​(GeoPoint point,
                  boolean animate,
                  boolean notify)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map to a specific GeoPoint centered in the MapView. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        point - The geographic coordinate to center on
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
        notify - If true, notify pan listeners
        See Also:
        AtakMapView

      • panZoomTo

        public void panZoomTo​(GeoPoint point,
                      double scale,
                      boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map to a specific GeoPoint centered in the MapView at the specified scale. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        point - The geographic coordinate to center on
        scale - The target scale of the map
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
        See Also:
        AtakMapView

                            double scale,
                            double rotation,
                            boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map to a specific GeoPoint centered in the MapView at the specified scale and rotation. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        point - The geographic coordinate to center on
        scale - The target scale of the map
        rotation - The target rotation of the map
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
        See Also:
        AtakMapView

      • panZoomRotateTo

        public void panZoomRotateTo​(GeoPoint point,
                            double scale,
                            double rotation,
                            boolean animate,
                            boolean notify)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map to a specific GeoPoint centered in the MapView at the specified scale and rotation. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        point - The geographic coordinate to center on
        scale - The target scale of the map
        rotation - The target rotation of the map
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
        notify - If true, notify pan listeners
        See Also:
        AtakMapView

      • panTo

        public void panTo​(GeoPoint point,
                  float viewx,
                  float viewy,
                  boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Pans the map to the specified coordinate, then translates the view by the number of pixels specified. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        point - The geographic coordinate to center on
        viewx - The x translation
        viewy - The y translation
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false

      • panByAtScale

        public void panByAtScale​(float x,
                         float y,
                         double scale,
                         boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map a given number of scaled pixels. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by the AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        x - Unscaled horizontal pixels to pan
        y - Unscaled vertical pixels to pan
        scale - The factor to scale the translation by
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false

      • panBy

        public void panBy​(float x,
                  float y,
                  boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map a given number of pixels. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        x - Horizontal pixels to pan
        y - Vertical pixels to pan
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false

      • panBy

        public void panBy​(float x,
                  float y,
                  boolean animate,
                  boolean notify)
        Deprecated.
        Pan the map a given number of pixels. The map will not pan past the extremities defined by AtakMapView.
        Parameters:
        x - Horizontal pixels to pan
        y - Vertical pixels to pan
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
        notify - If true, notify pan listeners

        Deprecated.
        Set the map scale (instant)
        Parameters:

        animate - Zoom smoothly if true; immediately if false

      • zoomBy

        public void zoomBy​(double scaleFactor,
                   float xpos,
                   float ypos,
                   boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Modifies the scale of the map and translates by the specified number of pixels. The translation offsets are specified at the current map scale.
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - The ratio to apply to the map scale.
        xpos - The x translation (at the current scale)
        ypos - The y translation (at the current scale)
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false

      • rotateTo

        public void rotateTo​(double rotation,
                     boolean animate)
        Deprecated.
        Sets the map to the specified rotation (animate)
        Parameters:
        rotation - The new rotation of the map
        animate - Rotate smoothly if true; immediately if false
